Head Blacksmith Ferris:
You can upgrade rare or common weapon, armor, and accessories. Well, you can upgrade only enchanted items, though. Also you will need special materials. You can upgrade common weapons starting from +12, common armor can be upgraded starting from +10, common accessories - starting from +8. These rules do not apply to rare items.
Success rate for an upgrade depends on the type of item. There can be unseuccessful tries. So, be careful. Remember that you can't upgrade augmented items or items with runes.
If you upgrade common armor, you can use only sealed grade-B and higher gloves/ boots/ helmets.
And one more thing. If you upgrade common armor to special, the items will be sealed.
Item types
Rare - updated rare and paid items
Common - enchanted D-A grade items
Special - S-grade items (including those received through exchange)
